segments.text: I can't believe what I'm witnessing in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally pouring over the sink's edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous sheet, creating a massive puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly oblivious to such an obvious problem?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, polishing a plate with intense focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is completely neutral, as if nothing is amiss at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she hear the running water or feel it soaking her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's beyond frustrating to see such a lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her inattention could lead to a really bad fall or major water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are practically performing acrobatics behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is so infuriating because it's completely avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap her out of her dish-drying trance right now!
segments.speaker: PAR
